short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'Fixes' Youtube Shorts on desktop by redirecting to the normal video player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fix Youtube Shorts (F YT Shorts):
Do you also dislike the Youtube Shorts player while on a normal desktop computer then this is the extension for you.

This simple and light extension will make it so that Youtube Short videos are opened in the normal player instead of more mobile like Youtube Shorts player. 

Update v1.0.1:
1. Fixed bug where it would only work when opening the video in a new tab.
2. Updated Icon.

planned future update:
1. Fix unnecessary error msg on extension tab.
